job_tasks.phrase: helpen bij het trainen van generatieve AI-modellen
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly indicates the involvement in the process of training AI models, which is the core of the Modeling task.

job_tasks.phrase: Het maken en beantwoorden van vragen met betrekking tot informatica om AI-modellen te helpen trainen.
job_tasks.justification: Creating and answering computer science-related questions to help train AI models is a form of interactive data generation and feedback, contributing to the model training process.

job_tasks.phrase: Het evalueren en rangschikken van code die door AI-modellen wordt gegenereerd.
job_tasks.justification: Evaluating and ranking AI-generated code is a crucial part of providing feedback for model improvement and training, fitting within the scope of Modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: ervaren software-engineer die zijn of haar expertise in codering wil inzetten
job_tasks.justification: The job explicitly seeks an experienced software engineer and mentions utilizing coding expertise, indicating a need for software development skills.

job_tasks.phrase: helpt 's werelds meest innovatieve bedrijven bij het verbeteren van hun AI-modellen
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the company's mission and how it serves other businesses, indicating an understanding of business context and client needs.

soft_skills.phrase: Er is geen eerdere ervaring met AI vereist.
De projecten bevatten meestal afgebakende, zeer gevarieerde problemen

classification.rationale: The role focuses on training generative AI models and evaluating AI-generated code. While it doesn't explicitly mention LLM frameworks, the emphasis on generative AI and interactive model training aligns strongly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
